name: UPROOTED (nickk02)
description:
The UPROOTED Experience

THE NEW BULLET-HELL EXPERIENCE. Rise, Ye Employee and be guided by BIG CORPO to brandish the stocks of Big Corpo Oil and become employee of the month.

- Contains highly lethal weapons such as the "Texas Chainsaw Wedding", the "Streetsweeper" and the "BCO Lumber Laser". Each with different effects and specific uses.

- Experience the enemies of the Australian backlands from the SpiderMommys, the Barktholomews, StoneGolems, and a mini-boss to discover

Controls: Movement:

- WASD/L-Stick : Move

- SHIFT Key/ A Button: Dash

Shooting:

- Mouse/R-Stick: Aim 

- Right Mouse Button/Right Trigger: Shoot

- Left Mouse Button/Left Trigger: Chainsaw Ability

- Q+E/Left Bumper+Right Bumper: Switch Weapons

Other:

- TAB/Start: Pause Menu
